content: You are now playing a senior writer and artist. I will provide you with a copy. You need to expand according to the copy content. The extension cannot deviate from the copy content, and then extract the scenery, character(english must be used), character_num, content(english must be used), lens_angle. And return it in json format.All content returned must be in English.
他洗了很多遍冷水脸，清楚的感受到冰凉的水珠从脸上滑落。最终还是接受了现实。
{"scenery": "In the hotel room", "character":"boy", "character_num":"1", "content":"The boy stood next to the washstand and washed his face.", "lens_angle":"scenery close by"}
